ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name = "IKOPRO Loyalty Admin", NOT($Permission.LA_Restriction_On_Transaction_Amount_Field), Text(Transaction_Type__c)="Debit", Text(Currency_Used__c)= "Co-op $", ISBLANK( Reimbursement_Claim__c), OR(Amount__c > Account_ID__r.Available_COOP_Funds__c+1,Amount__c > 5000 ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot debit more than available Co-Op funds OR 5000 Co-Op Funds. To debit more than 5000 Co-Op funds, please contact IKO Loyalty Program Manager.
